pr_title: chore: added UIID to prevent concurrency error

timeline.message: chore: added UIID to prevent concurrency error

timeline.bodyText: If two or more of these started at the same time, there could be duplicates.  Would that be ok?  If not, you should also add a UUID here.
timeline.author: lesv

replies.bodyText: there is clearRegistries function that deletes the registries based on created Date (from oldest to new ones).
replies.author: munkhuushmgl

replies.bodyText: You might be better off using java-reg-UUID-TimeMillis.
replies.author: lesv

timeline.bodyText: Seems like overkill to have currentTimeMillis + uuid, why not just UUID()?
timeline.author: lesv

replies.bodyText: Hmm, I do not know why it was done this way, but I will just replace with just UUID()
replies.author: munkhuushmgl

timeline.message: replaced with single UUID instead nested ones
replaced registry millis with UUID +  millis
